pr_title: GEODE-8182: change String commands to use one region

timeline.message: WIP - first stab at moving Strings to dataRegion
changed all String commands to use the function and to use a single region

fixed StringsIntegrationTest failures and
renabled tests ignored for GEODE-8182
removed the RedisLockService since it is not used in the new data model
removed the unused del methods on RedisSetCommands and RedisHashCommands
removed the KeyRegistar since it was no longer needed with a single data region

timeline.bodyText: This should be SetOptions(NX, 0L, ExpireUnit.NONE, false);
timeline.author: jdeppe-pivotal

replies.bodyText: Thanks for pointing this out. At this time, all that is used on the SetOptions when we call RedisStringCommands.set is the first parameter (NX in this case) so I just went with defaults on all the others. Some of these apply to expiration so they will be reviewed when the string expiration work is done.
replies.author: dschneider-pivotal
